abstract.t: This document outlines a method that may be used by authors of successor(or canceling) articles to authenticate their authorship of the originalarticle. As a proto-article article passes through various agents they may includethe hash of a secret string in a Cancel-Key header. Later if they wish touse a standard mechanism to remove the original article (eg Cancel orSupersede) they can include this string in the Cancel-Lock header toverify that they are entitled to perform this operation. Familiarity with the current News Article Format draft [ARTICLE] isassumed.
